i18n.title: LF2:Wemake v0.1.2
desc: gameplays, arts, and sounds are all from "Litter Fighter 2" basically,
created by Marti Wong and Starsky Wong in 1999.
The original author, Marti Wong, has now launched "Little Fighter 2 Remastered".
Please purchase it on Steam to support the original author.
玩法、美术、音效音乐来自《Litter Fighter 2》, 原作：Marti Wong，Starsky Wong。
原作者 Marti Wong 现已推出《Little Fighter 2 Remastered》，请在 Steam 购买，以支持原作者。
